user.title: Welcome to HASS AI
user.description_start: You are about to add the HASS AI control panel. After installation, you will find a new "HASS AI" item in your Home Assistant sidebar.
user.description_end: From there, you can initiate the scan of your entities and teach the AI how your home works. Click Submit to complete the installation.

scan_interval.description: Frequency of entity scans in days (1-30).
